result.name: applications-for-advanced-learning-loans-in-further-education-fe
result.notes: Advanced Learning Loans applications operational data. Contains data supplied by applicant in support of the application; and the assessment outcome.
result.title: Applications for Advanced Learning Loans in Further Education (FE)

extras.value: The Data Service (BIS FE) started publishing monthly statistics on applications on their website in June 2013 using data supplied to them by SLC. SLC will publish its Applications Processing performance for these new loans against Ministerial targets in the Annual Report for financial year 2013-14. The full dataset cannot be published because it contains personally identifiable information.
